00042 TableScanner::TableScanner(Comm *comm, Table *table,
00043     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator, const ScanSpec &scan_spec,
00044     uint32_t timeout_ms, bool retry_table_not_found)
00045   : m_eos(false), m_scanneri(0), m_rows_seen(0) {
00046 
00047   HT_ASSERT(timeout_ms);
00048 
00049   IntervalScannerPtr ri_scanner;
00050   ScanSpec interval_scan_spec;
00051   Timer timer(timeout_ms);
00052 
00053   if (scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00054     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00055       ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, table, range_locator, scan_spec,
00056                                        timeout_ms, retry_table_not_found);
00057       m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00058     }
00059     else {
00060       for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.cell_intervals.size(); i++) {
00061         scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00062         interval_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(
00063             scan_spec.cell_intervals[i]);
00064         ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, table, range_locator,
00065             interval_scan_spec, timeout_ms, retry_table_not_found);
00066         m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00067       }
00068     }
00069   }
00070   else {
00071     for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00072       scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00073       interval_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(scan_spec.row_intervals[i]);
00074       ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, table, range_locator,
00075           interval_scan_spec, timeout_ms, retry_table_not_found);
00076       m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00077     }
00078   }
00079 }

00082 bool TableScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00083 
00084   if (m_eos)
00085     return false;
00086 
00087   do {
00088     if (m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->next(cell))
00089       return true;
00090 
00091     m_rows_seen += m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->get_rows_seen();
00092 
00093     m_scanneri++;
00094 
00095     if (m_scanneri < m_interval_scanners.size())
00096       m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->set_rows_seen(m_rows_seen);
00097     else
00098       break;
00099   } while (true);
00100 
00101   m_eos = true;
00102   return false;
00103 }

00105 
00106 void Hypertable::copy(TableScanner &scanner, CellsBuilder &b) {
00107   Cell cell;
00108 
00109   while (scanner.next(cell))
00110     b.add(cell);
00111 }
